description: Advanced text-to-video generation with 5 billion parameters, offering high-quality output with detailed scene understanding

prompt.description: The text prompt to guide video generation
prompt.placeholder: A detailed cinematic scene with rich storytelling elements...

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated video

duration.description: Duration of the generated video in seconds

enable_prompt_expansion.description: Enable automatic prompt enhancement and expansion

prompt_details.style_guide: Create comprehensive, detailed scenes with rich storytelling and cinematic elements
best_practices: Include specific character details and motivations
Describe complex scenes with multiple elements
Use cinematic language and visual storytelling techniques

example_prompts.title: Epic Fantasy Scene
example_prompts.prompt: A detailed cinematic scene of a medieval knight standing atop a castle battlements during a thunderstorm, lightning illuminating ancient stone walls, rain-soaked armor gleaming, banner fluttering dramatically in the wind, distant mountains shrouded in storm clouds, the knight's determined expression visible through the helmet visor

example_prompts.title: Urban Drama
example_prompts.prompt: A noir-style scene in a rain-soaked city street at night, neon signs reflecting in puddles, a detective in a trench coat walking past shadowy alleyways, steam rising from manholes, the atmosphere thick with mystery and urban tension

request.prompt: A bustling marketplace in an ancient city, merchants selling colorful goods, people in traditional clothing moving through narrow streets, sunlight filtering through fabric awnings
A majestic waterfall cascading down rocky cliffs, mist creating rainbows in the sunlight, lush vegetation surrounding the natural wonder

url.description: URL where the video can be downloaded

content_type.description: MIME type of the video file

file_size.description: Size of the video file in bytes

usage_tips: 5B parameter model provides detailed scene understanding
Enable prompt expansion for richer, more detailed scenes
Higher resolutions available for professional quality
Longer durations allow for complex narrative development
Use detailed, story-driven prompts for best results
limitations: Larger model requires more processing time
Complex scenes may need careful prompt structuring
Higher resolutions and longer durations increase cost
Safety checker may filter some content
